name: squidinstall
text:
Install Squid Proxy Server
Allow Range:
IP: %1
Subnet: %2
Port: %3
Requires internet connection
shortDescription: Install Squid Proxy Server and set the allowed IP range. Internet connection required.
longDescription: This block runs apt-get install and edits the squid config file with perl via a bash script. An internet connection will be required for this to work.
